sentences.en: Asymmetric private keys should never be stored verbatim or in plain text on the local computer.
sentences.cn: 绝不应将非对称私钥逐字存储(即以纯文本形式存储)在本地计算机上.

sentences.en: Do not read word - by - word ( verbatim ) from your Power Point slides.
sentences.cn: 切忌挨字朗读PPT幻灯片上所写的内容.

sentences.en: Encloses code added to generated wrapper file verbatim.
sentences.cn: 括起来的代码将原封不动地添加到生成的封装文件中.

sentences.en: Hansard provide a verbatim account of the proceeding of the house of commons.
sentences.cn: 英国议会议事录一字不差地记述了下院议事程序.
他逐字逐句地把她的话重复了一遍.
他逐字报道了那篇讲话。

sentences.en: His memory was so good that he could repeat many Shakespeare plays verbatim
sentences.cn: 他记忆力极好，能一字不错地背出好多部莎士比亚的戏剧。

sentences.en: His memory was so good that he could repeat many Shakespeare plays verbatim.
sentences.cn: 他记忆力极好,能一字不错地背出好多部莎士比亚的戏剧.

sentences.en: I was treated to a verbatim report of every conversation she's taken part in over the past week.
sentences.cn: 有人一字不差地向我报告了她在过去一周参加的所有谈话。

sentences.en: In this task, takers repeat sentences verbatim.
sentences.cn: 在这个部分, 考生将逐词逐句地复述句子.

sentences.en: It was an almost verbatim reply of many exchanges of previous years.
sentences.cn: 这种对话和前几年的多次对话几乎一字不差.

sentences.en: It was nothing but a verbatim translation.
sentences.cn: 这只不过是逐字的直译罢了.

sentences.en: Some quotations he carried verbatim in his mind.
sentences.cn: 有些引语他是逐字背诵下来的.

sentences.en: Sometimes, however, Mechanical - Age representations shouldn't be translated verbatim into the digital world.
sentences.cn: 然而有时机械时代的表现方式不应该完全转换到数字时代中.

sentences.en: The following is taken almost verbatim from Cox's paper.
sentences.cn: 以下几乎是照搬考克思的文章.

sentences.en: The president's speeches are regularly reproduced verbatim in the state-run newspapers.
sentences.cn: 这位总统的演讲经常会一字不差地被刊登在那些国有报纸上。

sentences.en: Their stories were taped and transcribed verbatim.
sentences.cn: 他们讲的事被录了音，并一字不差地被记了下来。

trans.tran_en: repeating the actual words that were spoken or written

trans.tran_cn: 一字不差的（地）；逐字的（地）

trans.tran_en: If you repeat something verbatim, you use exactly the same words as were used originally
